survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Home Security System Installation Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who have recently had home security systems installed to evaluate satisfaction levels, identify areas for improvement, and understand overall service quality.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall installation process of your home security system?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall installation process of your home security system?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the clarity of communication from the installation team during the process?
